title: System Integration Engineer (Product Calibration & Test - Display)
summary: Apple is a place where extraordinary people gather to do their best work...
description: The Systems Integration Engineer will be in charge of developing customized test systems and its HW/SW integration to calibrate and test the performance of Apple products...
key_qualifications: 3+ years of hardware test engineering or system integration background, Outstanding HW/SW integration, problem solving and optimization skill, Experienced on design, develop and deploy test infrastructure, equipment at NPI(New Product Introduction) and MP(Mass Production) factory, Proficient in Matlab, C/C++/OC and scripting language(Python, Lua), Working proficiency in English communication, Excellent interpersonal skills and clear communications, Highly motivated and self-directed, Experienced on display system calibration and testing, display defects and its detection methodology, Broad range of knowledge in optical display technologies(such as LCD, OLED, microLED), image processing, color science and software
education_experience: BS/MS in Physics, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering or equivalent engineering field.
